attributes.action: Ban any mention of his departure and/or legacy for the next 7 weeks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of Great Britain are already heartily sick of media coverage of Mr Blair's departure, legacy and replacement. Faced with another 55 days of this many are contemplating suicide. We request an embargo on this subject in all media.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
